languages.text: "А я вот знаю других "тварей из теней", господин ван Калокс. Да и вы тоже, ибо Великий наградил вас обширными познаниями во всем, что связано с ксеносами. То, что описывает эта несчастная, напоминает мне о мандрагорах, что прячутся в Паутине. Не могу понять, что на вас нашло, раз вы собственным разумением до этого дойти не сумели..."

traits.locale_text: "А я вот знаю других "тварей из теней", господин ван Калокс. Да и вы тоже, ибо Великий наградил вас обширными познаниями во всем, что связано с ксеносами. То, что описывает эта несчастная, напоминает мне о мандрагорах, что прячутся в Паутине. Не могу понять, что на вас нашло, раз вы собственным разумением до этого дойти не сумели..."

languages.text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."
languages.original_text: "А я вот знаю других "тварей из теней", господин ван Калокс. Да и вы тоже, ибо Великий наградил вас обширными познаниями во всем, что связано с ксеносами. То, что описывает эта несчастная, напоминает мне о мандрагорах, что прячутся в Паутине. Не могу понять, что на вас нашло, раз вы собственным разумением до этого дойти не сумели..."

traits.locale_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

"Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

"Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

"Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

languages.text: “这么说吧，我知道还有别的生物，也是从阴影中冒出来的，冯·卡洛克斯大师。你也同样知道，因为至高无上的神皇赐予了你丰富的知识，让你对异形与相关的一切了如指掌。在我听来，这个可怜人描述的怪物，很像是潜伏在网道里的曼德拉。我不明白你为什么没有得出同样的结论……”
languages.original_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，我知道还有别的生物，也是从阴影中冒出来的，冯·卡洛克斯大师。你也同样知道，因为至高无上的神皇赐予了你丰富的知识，让你对异形与相关的一切了如指掌。在我听来，这个可怜人描述的怪物，很像是潜伏在网道里的曼德拉。我不明白你为什么没有得出同样的结论……”

languages.text: «Bueno, yo conozco a otras "criaturas de las sombras", maestro van Calox, y usted también, porque el Exaltado le ha concedido un gran conocimiento de los xenos y todo lo relacionado con ellos. La descripción de este desdichado me recuerda a las mandrágoras que acechan en la Telaraña. No sé por qué no ha llegado a la misma conclusión...».
languages.original_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, yo conozco a otras "criaturas de las sombras", maestro van Calox, y usted también, porque el Exaltado le ha concedido un gran conocimiento de los xenos y todo lo relacionado con ellos. La descripción de este desdichado me recuerda a las mandrágoras que acechan en la Telaraña. No sé por qué no ha llegado a la misma conclusión...».

languages.text: 「ええ、あたしは他の『影の生物』のことを知っているわ、異端審問官さん。あなたも知っているでしょう―エグザルテッド・ワンがあなたに異種族とそれに関連するすべての広範な知識を与えてくださったのだから。その説明で、この哀れな生き物はマンドレイクじゃないかと思ったの。網辻に潜んでいるのよ。なぜあなたも同じ結論に至らなかったのかわからないわ…」
languages.original_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、あたしは他の『影の生物』のことを知っているわ、異端審問官さん。あなたも知っているでしょう―エグザルテッド・ワンがあなたに異種族とそれに関連するすべての広範な知識を与えてくださったのだから。その説明で、この哀れな生き物はマンドレイクじゃないかと思ったの。網辻に潜んでいるのよ。なぜあなたも同じ結論に至らなかったのかわからないわ…」

languages.text: « Eh bien, je connais d'autres créatures issues des ombres, maître van Calox. Et vous aussi, car l'Exalté vous a octroyé une connaissance approfondie des xénos et de tout ce qui s'y rattache. La description de cette pauvre âme m'évoque les Mandragores qui rôdent dans la Toile. Je me demande bien pourquoi vous n'êtes pas arrivé à la même conclusion... »
languages.original_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, je connais d'autres créatures issues des ombres, maître van Calox. Et vous aussi, car l'Exalté vous a octroyé une connaissance approfondie des xénos et de tout ce qui s'y rattache. La description de cette pauvre âme m'évoque les mandragores qui rôdent dans la Toile. Je me demande bien pourquoi vous n'êtes pas arrivé à la même conclusion... »

languages.text: "Nun, ich kenne noch andere 'Kreaturen aus dem Schatten', Meister van Calox. Und Ihr auch – denn der Erhabene hat Euch umfassendes Wissen über Xenos und alles, was damit zu tun hat, gewährt. Die Beschreibung dieser armen Seele klang mir nach Mandraks, wie sie im Netz der Tausend Tore lauern. Ich weiß gar nicht, warum Ihr darauf noch nicht selbst gekommen seid ..."
languages.original_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, ich kenne noch andere 'Kreaturen aus dem Schatten', Meister van Calox. Und Ihr auch – denn der Erhabene hat Euch umfassendes Wissen über Xenos und alles, was damit zu tun hat, gewährt. Die Beschreibung dieser armen Seele klang mir nach Mandraks, wie sie im Netz der Tausend Tore lauern. Ich weiß gar nicht, warum Ihr darauf noch nicht selbst gekommen seid ..."

languages.text: "Ben başka 'gölgelerden çıkan yaratıklar' da biliyorum Üstat van Calox. Sen de biliyorsun elbette, Görkemli sana zenolar ve onlarla ilgili her şey hakkında geniş bir bilgi ihsan etmiş. Bu zavallının tanımları bana Ağyol'da kol gezen Kankurutanları hatırlattı. Neden sen de aynı sonuca varamadın, orasını bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Well, I know of other 'creatures from the shadows,' Master van Calox. And so do you — for the Exalted One has granted you extensive knowledge of xenos and everything related to them. This poor soul's description sounded to me like the Mandrakes that lurk in the Webway. I don't know why you didn't come to the same conclusion yourself..."

traits.locale_text: "Ben başka 'gölgelerden çıkan yaratıklar' da biliyorum Üstat van Calox. Sen de biliyorsun elbette, Görkemli sana zenolar ve onlarla ilgili her şey hakkında geniş bir bilgi ihsan etmiş. Bu zavallının tanımları bana Ağyol'da kol gezen Kankurutanları hatırlattı. Aynı sonuca neden senin de varmadığını bilmiyorum."
